column100:
We offer: 
 
 
 6 months employment with the possibility of permanent employment hereafter 
 A fun and dynamic team in a high paced work environment 
 Newly refurnished offices and access to gym 
 
 
 The job: A.P. Moller - Maersk is an integrated container logistics company working to connect and simplify its customers’ supply chains. As the global leader in shipping services, the company operates in 130 countries and employs roughly 76,000 people. As an employee at Maersk you are part of a diverse and dynamic work environment with humbleness and professionalism embedded in the culture. As a Financial Controller it is important that you are able to communicate with different stakeholders and that you can work under pressure in certain periods eg. when closing the month. Therefor it is also essential that you are able to prioritize between tasks. Furthermore, it is important that you are technically good in understanding Danish tax and regulations. Key responsibilities: 
 
 
 Assist setting up accounting structure 
 Day to day accounting and reporting 
 Tax filing 
 Preparation of ad hoc financial reports 
 Follow up on Actual vs. Budget 
 
 
 About you: To apply for this possition, you must be legally authorized to work in Denmark and already be living in the country. 
 Ideally you have about 5+ years of overall combined accounting and finance experience and a bachelor’s degree in finance/economics. Its an advantage if you have experience working in a challenging, fast paced and changing environment dealing with a lot of different tasks at the same time. Furthermore, we expect that you: 
 
 
 are result-driven, strong logical & analytical 
 are well organized with attention to detail. 
 have experience with creating financial statements, and the month-end/year end close process 
 are skilled in written and spoken English 
 
 
 The practical: Work location: A.P. Møller Mærsk, Esplanaden 50, 1098 København K Startup: As soon as possible Work hours: Full time, distributed on weekdays within normal office hours Salary according to qualifications We hire on an ongoing basis, so if you are interested in the job please apply via the button. Maersk is collaborating with Experis in this recruitment process, so if you have any questions about the position, please contact Resource Manager, Astrid Gotlieb on tel. 4590 2800 on weekdays between 10:00-14:00.
